title: "MPG & Engine Size & Fuel Type (Shaye)"
output: html_document
date: "2025-11-11"

``` {r}
library(ggplot2)
```

``` {r}
df <- read.csv("bmw.csv")
summary(df)
```
WRITE text here

``` {r count of vehicles}
ggplot(df, aes(x=fuelType)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title="Count of Vehicles by Fuel Type")
```
basic observtaions about the chart

``` {r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=fuelType, y=mpg, fill=fuelType)) +
  geom_violin(trim=FALSE) +
  geom_boxplot(width=0.1, fill="white") +
  labs(title="MPG Distribution by Fuel Type")
```

observations about the violin chart

``` {r MPG vs Engine Size by Fuel Type}
ggplot(df, aes(x=mpg, y=engineSize)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ fuelType) +
  labs(title="MPG vs Engine Size by Fuel Type")
```

observations about the charts
